name: Starfighter Arduxim
description: Strap into the cockpit of your Arduxim fighter and take on enemy starships in this first-person tactical space shooter. Harks back to the classic Wing Commander games. Playable in VR or on monitor. Requires a gamepad.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 Storage: 900 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
